name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interface Exploitation
description: A playbook to mitigate incidents involving command and scripting interface vulnerabilities leading to unauthorized access and execution.

parallel--b2c9a6d7-4e7d-431c-b5a5-7f87b7.name: Parallel Mitigation Actions
parallel--b2c9a6d7-4e7d-431c-b5a5-7f87b7.description: Execute multiple mitigation steps concurrently to address the threat comprehensively.

action--a6da8e59-8a4d-4605-8e52-e8518eab.name: Kill malicious process
action--a6da8e59-8a4d-4605-8e52-e8518eab.description: Terminate processes found running with malicious commands.

if-condition--b7e4c9ad6-22a6-4f8b-a1ec-c.name: Check for unauthorized scripts
if-condition--b7e4c9ad6-22a6-4f8b-a1ec-c.description: If unauthorized scripts are detected in the system, remove them.

action--7e4c9ad6-22a6-4f8b-a1ec-c878e4d7.name: Remove unauthorized scripts
action--7e4c9ad6-22a6-4f8b-a1ec-c878e4d7.description: Find and remove scripts that match unauthorized patterns.

action--c88aeccb-3d76-4c77-9b8c-715af7a5.name: Block outgoing traffic to malicious IP
action--c88aeccb-3d76-4c77-9b8c-715af7a5.description: Prevent outgoing connections to the malicious IP address.

while-condition--a0b9ec47-b1f4-404e-b4a9.name: System Integrity Loop
while-condition--a0b9ec47-b1f4-404e-b4a9.description: Perform system integrity checks and loop until no infection is found.

action--5e698bca-3f43-4482-aa23-3f56fb8e.name: Perform system integrity checks
action--5e698bca-3f43-4482-aa23-3f56fb8e.description: Run checks to detect any system infections.

infection_found.description: Indicates if any infection has been found.

action--c5a61b48-79c6-456b-bf59-f5d4427a.name: Restore modified system files
action--c5a61b48-79c6-456b-bf59-f5d4427a.description: Restore critical system files from backup.
